column2: dunya kashalak hwquqa khatabnamasa

yeansanlar yeayealasanang barlaq yeaezalarnang yeoezagae khas yeazzaet-hoermatana shunangdaek yeularnang baravaer vae taevraenmaes hwquqana yeaetrap qalashnang dunyava yeaerkanlak, haeqqanayaet vae tantchlaqnang yeasasa yeakaenlaka,

kashalak hwquqagha yeetabarsaz qarash vae haqaraet kaeltyuryush yeaevj yeelap kashalaernang vajdanana bwlghaydaghan yavuz zwravanlaqqa yeaylanghanlaqa, haemmae yeadaem soez yeaerkanlaka vae yeetaqad yeaerkanlakadan baehramaen bwladaghan haemdae vaehamae vae namratlaqtan khalay bwladaghan dunyanang yetap kelasha yeadday khaelqnang yealay yearzusa daep yeelan qalanghanlaqa,

yeansanlanang yealajasazlaqtan zwravanlaq vae zulum yeyustadae yeasyan koetyuramaz daep taevaekkulagae haerakaet qalap yurmaeslaka yeyutchyun, kashalak hwquqana qanun yearqalaq yeadarae qalash ywla balaen qwghdash zoeryur bwlghanlaqa,
doelaetlaer yeara dwstluq myunasavatanang taeraeqqayatana yealgha syurush zoeryurluka,

barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer taeshkalartagha yeaeza doelaetlaer khaelqanang barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer khartayasadae yeoezlanang yeasasy kashalak hwquqa, yeasanay yeazzaet-hoermata vae qaedar-qammata shunangdaek yeaer-yeayallarnang baravaerlak hwquqa twghrasadaka yeaerqadasana qayta taekaltagaenlaka haemdae bar qaedaer tchwng yeaerkanlak yeasasada jaemyeayaetnang yuksalasha vae turmush daerajasanang yakhsalanashana yealgha syuryushkae bael baghlaghanlaqa.

yeaeza doelaetlaernang barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer taeshkalata balaen haemkarlashap, kashalak hwquqa vae yeasasay yeaerkanlaknang yewmumyuzluk hoermaetlanasha vae yeaemaelgae qwyulushana yealgha syuryush ywlada qaetyeay yearadagae kaelgaenlaka,
yeashu hwquq vae yeaerkanlakna yewmumyuzluk tchushanashnang shu qaetyeay yearadanang twluq yeaemaelgae yeashurulushagha muham taesar koersatadaghanlaqa,
koezdae tutulghatchqa, hazar
yaghan,

barlaq khaelq vae barlaq doelaet tarashap yeaemaelgae yeashuradaghan yewrtaq yeoeltchaem syupatadae mushu dunya kashalak hwquqa khatabnamasana yeelan qaladu. haer bar yeadaem vae yeajtamayeay yeapparatnang mushu khatabnamana haer dayeam yeaestae tchang saqlap, taelam vae taerbayae yearqalaq hwquq vae yeaerkanlaknang hoermaetlanashna tarashap algha syuryusha haemdae doelaetlaernang vae khaelqyearanang taedrajay yealgaralaesh taedbarlara yearqalaq yeashu hwquq vae yeaerkanlaknang yeaeza doelaetlaernang yeoezadaka khaelq yearasada shunangdaek shu doelaetlaernang bashqurush taevaelakadaka zemanada yashaydaghan khaelq yearasada yewmumyyuzlyuk vae yeunumluk yeaetarap qalanasha vae yeaemaelgae qwyulushana yeumad qaladu:
1 madda

haemmae yeadaem zanadanla yeaerkan, yeazzaet-hoermaet vae hwquqta bapbaravaer bwlup tughulghan. yeular yeaeqalghae vae vajdangha yeagae haemdae bar-baragae qerandashlaq munasavatagae khas rwh balaen mwyeamalae qalasha keraek.
2 madda

haemmae yeadaem  mushu khatabnamadae qaeyt qalanghan barlaq hwquq vae yeaerkanlaktan baehramaen bwlush salahayatagae yeagae. yeular yearqa, raengga, jansa, tala, dana, sayasay qarasha yaka bashqa qarasha, doelaet taevaelaka yaka yeajtamayeay kelap tchaqasha, myulka, tughulusha yaka bashqa salahayata jaehaettan qaltchae paerqlaenmaeydu.

yeunang yeustagae haemmae yeadaem yewza taevae doelaet yaka zemannang syasay, maemuray laka khaelqyeara yewrnanang yewkhshash bwlmaslaqa balaen paerqlaenmaeydu. bu zemannang mustaeqal zeman, vakalataen bashquruluvatqan zeman, yeaptwnwmayasaz zeman yaka bashqa haerqandaq agalak hwquqagha tchaek qwyulghan halaettaka zeman bwlushadan qaetyeaynaezaer.
3 madda
haemmae yeadaem hayatlaqtan, yeaerkanlaktan vae jasmanay bakhaetaerlaktan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
4 madda
haerqandaq yeadaemna qul qalashqa yaka qul qatarada yeashlatashkae bwlmaydu. haerqandqaq shaekaldaka qulluq twzumnamu, qullarna yeelap-setashnamu maenyea qalash keraek.
5 madda
haerqandaq yeadamna raehamsazlak balaen qaynashqa yaka vaehshay, yeansanayaetsaz yaka jaqaraet kharakterlak muyeamalagae yaka jazagha dutchar qalashqa bwlmaydu.
6 madda
haemmae yeadaem haerqandaq jayda qanun yealdadaka kashalak yeazzatana yeetarap qaldurushqa hwquqluq.
7 madda

haemmae yeadaem qanun yealdada babbaravaer haemdae qaltchae kaemsatalmaey, qanunnang baravaer qwghdashadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq. haemmae yeadaem mushu khatabnamagae khalap haerqandaq kaemsatashtan vae mushundaq kaemsatashkae turtkae bwladaghan qalmashnang zayankaeshlakdan saqlanash yutchyun, baravaer qwghdashtan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
8 madda

haerqandaq yeadaem yewzanang yeasasay qanun yaka qanunlar baekhsh yeaetkaen asasay hwquqa zayankaeshlakkae yeutchraghanda, layaqaetlak doelaet swta yearqalaq bundaq zayankaeshlak haerakatadan yeunumluk qutulup qelashqa hwquqluq.
9 madda
haerqandaq yeadaemna haerqandaq shaekaldae qwlgha yeelashqa, naezaer baent qalashqa yaka syurgyun qalashqa bwlmaydu.
10 madda

haemmae yeadaem mustaeqal haem khalas swtnang yeadal vae yewtchuq swraq qalasha balaen yeoezanang hwquqa vae maejburayatana muyeaeyyaenlaeshturushkae haemdae yeoezagae qwyulghan haerqandaq janaya yeaeyabna yeenaqlavelashqa pyutyunlaey hwquqluq.
11 madda

janaya yeashlar balaen yerz qalanghanlaka adaem yeqlash jaehaettae lazamlaq barlaq kapalaetkae yeerashkaen yeashkara swtta janayata barlaa qanun bwyatchae daelallaengatchae gunahsaz daep qaralashqa hwquqluq.

haerqandaq yeadaemnang haerqandaq qalmasha yaka qalmashsazlaqa sadar bwlghan vaqtada doelaet qanuna yaka khaelqyeara qanun bwyatchae janaya yeashlar janayatana shaekallaendurmakaen bwlsa, janaya yeashlar janayatana yeoetkyuzgaen daep hoekyum tchaqarashqa bwlmaydu. janaya jaza janayaet yeoetkyuzgaendae taetbaq qalandaghan qanundaka baelgalamalaerdakadan yeegharlatavetalsae bwlmaydu.
12 madda

haerqandaq yeadaemnang khususay turmushagha, yeaalasagae, turalghu jayaghu vae khaet-yealaqasagae khalaghantchae yearalashavelashqa bwlmaydu. yeunang shaena vae shoehratagae hujum qalashqa bwlmaydu. bundaq yearalashashtan yaka hujumdan saqlanash yeyutchyun, haemmae yeadaem qanunnang qwghdashadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
13 madda
haemmae yeadaem haerqaysa doelaetlaernang zemanada yeaerkan kwtchushkae vae yewlturaqlashashqa hwquqluq.
haemmae yeadaem haerqandaq doelaettan ketashkae, jwmladan yeoez doelatadan ketashkae hwquqluq haemdae yeoezanang doelatagae qaytap kelashkae hwquqluq.
14 madda
haemmae yeadaem zayankaeshlaktan saqlanash yeyutchyun, bashqa doelaetlaerdae panah talaeshkae vae panahlanashqa hwquqluq.

haeqaqaetaen ghaeyray sayasay janayaet yaka barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer taeshkalatanang asasay maeqsata vae pransapagha khalap qalash balaen yeaeyablaengaen yeaehval astada, bundaq hwquqtan paydalanashqa bwlmaydu.
15 madda
haemmae  yeadaem doelaet taevaelakadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
haerqandaq yeadaemna doelaet taevaelakadan khalaghantchae maehrum qalashqa bwlmaydu. unang doelaet taevaelakana yeoezgaertash hwquqana yeankar qalashqamu bwlmaydu.
16 madda

yash qwramagha yaetkaen yeaer-yeayallar yearq. doelaet taevaelaka vae dan jaehaettan haerqandqa tchaeklamagae yeutchramay, twylashashqa vae yeoey tutushqa hwquqluq. yeular nakah jaehaettae, twy qalghan maezgaldae vae nakah twkhtama bakar qalanghanda, baravaer hwquqqa yeagae bwlusha keraek.
yeaer taeraep balaen yeayal taeraepnang yeakhtayar qalasha vae tamamaen maqul bwlusha yearqasadala twy qalashqa bwladu.
yeayealae taebayeay vae yeasasay yeajtamayeay barlak, yew jaemyeayaet vae doelaet taerpadan qwghdalashqa tegashlang.
17 madda
haemmae yeadaemnang myulyukkae yewngtchae yeagadarlaq qalash hwquqa shunangdaek bashqalar balaen sheraklashap yeagadarlaq qalash hwquqa bwlusha keraek.
haerqandaq yeadaemna mal-myulkadan khalaghantchae maehrum qalashqa bwlmadu.
18 madda

haemmae yeadaem yeadayava, vajdanay vae danay yeaerkanlak hwquqaghq yeagae: bu hwquq shu yeadaemnang yeoezanang danana yaka yeetaqadana yeoezgaertash yeaerkanlakana shunangdaek yeoezanang dana yaka yeetaqadana danay yeeqadae, yeaemaelayaet, namaz-yeabadaet vae yeaemramaerup yearqalaq yalghuz yaka yeoem, yeashkara yaka maekhpay yeapadalaesh yeaerkanlakana yeoez yeatchagae yealadu.
19 madda

haemmae yeadaem yeoez taeshaebbusana baldyuryush vae pakar bayan qalash yeaerkanlakadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq; bu hwquq mudakhalagae yeutchramay yeoez taeshaebbusana saqlap qelash yeaerkanlakana vae yeutchur haem pakarlaerna haerqandaq vasatae yearqalaq vae doelaet yeayramasagha qaramay yeazdaesh, qwbul qalash vae tarqatash yeaerkanlakana yeoez yeatchagae yealadu.
20 madda
haemmae yeadaem tantch ywl balaen yaghan yeoetkyuzyush vae taeshkalanlar yeuyushush yeaerkanlakadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
haerqandaq yeadaemna maelum bar taeshkalatnang taevaelakagae yeoetyushkae zwrlashqa bwlmaydu.
21 madda
haemmae yeadaem doelaetna yeadarae qalashqa yeoeza bavastae qatnashash yaka yeoeza yeaerkan tallaghan vaekala yearqalaq qatnashash hwquqagha yeagae.
haemmae yeadaem yeoez doelatanang hoekyumaet yeashlaragha baravaer pursaet balaen  qatnashash hwquqagha yeagae.

khaelqnang yearadasa hoekyumaet hwquqanang yeasasa: bw yearadae qaeraellak vae haeqaqay saylam balaen yeapadalanasha keraek. saylam yewmumyyulyuk vae baravaer yeavaz berash hwquqagha yeasaslanasha haemdae ywshurun yeavaz berash yaka yewbdanla yeaerkan yeavaz berash bwyatchae yeaelap beralasha keraek.
22 madda

haer bar yeadaem jaemyeayaetnang bar yeazasa bwlush syupata balaen, yeajtamayeay kapalaettan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq haemdae yeoezanang shaekhsay yeazzaet-hoermata vae kashalak ghururanang yeaerkan ravajlanasha yeyutchyun zoeryur bwlghan yeaqtasaday, ajtamayeay jaehaettaka vae maedaenayaet jaehaettaka haer khal hwquqlardan baehramaen bwlushna yeaemaelgae yeashurushqa hwquqluq. bu yeaemaelgae yeashurush doelaetnang tarashtchanlaqa vae khaelqyeaara haemkarlaq yearqalaq haemdae haerqayasa doelaetlaernang taeshkalata vae baylaq yeaehvala bwyatchae bwladu.
23 madda
haemmae yeadaem yeashlaeshkae, yeaerkan kaesap tallashqa, yeadal vae muvabaq khazmaet sharayeatadan baehramaen bwlushqa haemdae yeashsaz qelashtan saqlanash kapalatadan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.
haemmae yeadaem haerqandaq shaekaldae kaemsatalmaey, yewkhshash yeash yeyutchyun yewkhshash haeq yeelash hwquqagha yeagae.

yeashlagaen yeadaemnang haer bara yeadal vae muvapaq haeqtan baehramaen bwlushqa, yeoezanang vae yeayealae tavabayeatanang yeansanay azzaet-hoermaetkae layaq turmush sharayeatagha yeagae bwlushana kapalaetkae yeagae qalashqa, zoeryur tepalghanda. yeunanggha bashqa yeajtamayeaya kapalaetna qwshumtchae qalashqa hwquqluq.
haemmae yeadaem yeoezanang maenpaeyeatana qwghdash yeyutchyun, yeashtchalar yeuyushmusana taeshkallaesh vae yeunanggha qatnashash hwquqagha yeagae.
24 madda
haemmae yeadaem daem yeelash vae bakar yyuryush hwquqadan, jumladan yeash vaqtanang tchekana yeaeqalgae muvapaqlashturush haemdae qaeraellak, mayeashlaq daem yeelash hwquqadan baehramaen bwladu.
25 madda

haemmae yeadaem yeoezanang vae yeayealae tavabayeatanang salamaetlaka vae paravanlaqana kapalaetkae yeagae qalash yeyutchyun zoeryur bwlghan turmush saevayasadan, jumladan yemaeklak, kayam-betchaek, turaghu yeoey, davalanashtan vae zoeryur yeajtamayeay mulazamaettchalaktan baehramaen bwlush hwquqagha yeagae: ashsaz qalghanda, kesael bwlup qalghanda, maejruh bwlup qalghanda, tul qalghanda, qeraghanda yaka tazganlagala bwlmadaghan bashqa yeaehval balaen taraktchalak yeaqtadarana ywqatqanda, kapalaettan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq.

yeanalar vae balalar yealahadae yeetabardan vae yardaemdan baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqluq. barlaq balalar nakahlaq yaka nakahsaz tughulghanlaqagha qaramay, yewkhshash yeajtamayeay muhapazaettan baehramaen bwlushqa tegashlak.
26 madda

haemae yeadaem balam yeelash hwquqagha yeagae. balam yeelash haeqsaz bwlusha keraek. hetch bwlmaghanda, bashlanghutch vae yeasasay basqutchta shundaq bwlusha keraek. bashlanghutch mayearap maejburayaet kharakterada bwlusha keraek. tekhnaka mayearapa vae kaespay mayearapa yewmumyyuzlyuk taesas qalash keraek. yealay mayearapnang yeashakana naetajagae qarap barlaq kashalaergae taeng yeetchavetash keraek.

mayearapnang maeqsata yeadmnang khaslaqana bwluq yetaldyuryush haemdae kashalak hwquqa vae yeasasay yeaerkanlakkae bwlghan hoermaetna kyutchaeytash. mayearap haerqaysa doelaetlaer, yearqlar, yaka haerqaysa danay guruhlar yeara tchushanashna, ywl qwyushna vae dwstluqna yealgara syuryusha haemdae barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer taeshkalatanang tantchlaqna qwghdash ywladaka turluk payealayaetlarna yealgha syuryusha keraek.
yeata-yeanalar paerzaentlaranang yeelashqa tegashlak balam turlarana yeavval tallash hwquqagha agae.
27 madda

haemmae yeadaem jaemyeayaetnang maedaenay twrmushagha yeaerkan qatnashap, saenyeaettan baehramaen bwlushqa haemdae yealam-paen taeraeqqayatadan vae yeunangdan hasal bwlghan paravanlaqtan taeng baehramaen bwlushqa hwquqlaeq.
haemmae yeadaem yeoeza yeajad qalghan yealmay, baedayeay yeaesaerlaerdan vae guzael saenyeaet yeaesaerlaradan hasal bwlghan maenava vae madday maenpaet munasavata balaen, qwghalash hwquqagha yeagae.
28 madda
haemmae yeadaem mushu khatabnamadae qaeyt qalanghan hwquq vae yeaerkanlaknang twluq reyeallashashagha yeamkan beradaghan bar khal yeajtamayeay vae khaelqyeara taertapna taelaep qalashqa hwquqluq.
29 madda
haemmae yeadaem jaemyeayaet yealdada maejburayaetna yeyustagae yealghan bwladu. tchunka, yeularnang khaslaqa khaemyeayaet yeatchadala yeaerkan vae twluq ravaj taplaydu.

haemmae yeadaem yeoezanang hwquqa vae yeaerkanlakana yyurgyuzgaendae, qanunda baelgalaengaen tchaeklamagala yeutchraydu. bundaq tchaeklamana baelgalaeshtaka bardanbar maeqsaet bashqalarnang hwquqa vae yeaerkanlakanang tegashlak daerajadae yeetarap qalanasha vae hoermaet qalanashagha kapalaetlak qalash haemdae demwkratak jaemyeayaettae yeaekhlaq. jamayeaet taertapa vae yewmumay paravanlaqnang yewrunluq yeehtayajagha layqlashash.
yeashu hwquq vae yeaerkanlaklaerna yyurgyuzgaendae, haerqandaq yeaehvalda barlaeshkaen doelaetlaer taeshkalatnang yeasasay maeqsata vae pransapagha khalaplaq qalashqa bwlmaydu.
30 madda

bu khatabnamanang haerqandaq bar maddasana haerqandaq doelaet, guruh yaka shaekhs mushu khatabnamadae qaeyt qalanghan haerqandaq hwquq vae yeaerkanlakna buzush maeqsatadaka payealayaet yaka haerakaetlaerna yeelap berashqa hwquqluq daep sukut qaladaghan maenadae tchushaendurushkae bwlmaydu.
